name: ...Never Existed...
text:
Main: You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Imu], K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Stages with a cost of 7. 
Counter: If your Leader is [Imu], up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

effect.text: You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Imu], K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Stages with a cost of 7.
If your Leader is [Imu], up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
targets: up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards
